attributes.action: Not to close Saxmundham Middle School in 2012 and make it a secondary school
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the parents of the pupils at Saxmundham Middle School in Suffolk. Would like it to become a secondsry school and not be closed, it was a modern school when it was first built. so while not make it one again? Instead of putting 300+ children on buses that have to go down narrow country lanes.
